steps.title: Cook the Sushi Rice
instructions: Rinse the sushi rice under cold water until the water runs clear.
Combine the rinsed rice and water in a rice cooker and cook according to the manufacturer's instructions. Once cooked, let it sit for 10 minutes.
Mix rice vinegar, sugar, and salt in a small bowl until dissolved. Gently fold this mixture into the cooked rice. Allow the rice to cool to room temperature.

steps.title: Prepare the Salmon Mixture
instructions: In a bowl, combine flaked smoked salmon, mayonnaise, and sriracha. Mix well.

steps.title: Assemble the Bake
instructions: In a baking dish, evenly spread the seasoned sushi rice. Press down slightly.
Spread the salmon mixture over the rice and sprinkle a generous amount of furikake seasoning on top.
Bake in the preheated oven for 10-15 minutes, or until the top is slightly golden and heated through.

steps.title: Add Toppings
instructions: Remove from the oven and top with sliced cucumber, avocado, and strips of nori.

steps.title: Serve
instructions: Serve hot with soy sauce, pickled ginger, and wasabi on the side.
